name: AddSkillsToProspect
description:
Add skills to a specific prospect in the recruiting system.

This tool adds one or multiple skills to a prospect's profile in Workday's recruiting system. Specify the prospect ID and provide the skills as JSON objects in the request body. Use this when you need to update a candidate's skill set.

parameters.name: prospect_workday_id
parameters.description: The unique Workday ID for the prospect to whom skills will be added.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

parameters.name: skills_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the skills to be added for the prospect. Include required fields like 'name'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Workday API

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
